department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development
full_summary:
# Notice for Cancellation of Tender: PW-22-01017381
## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: PW-22-01017381
* **Solicitation Number**: 2022-P-010649-7444735
* **Tender Title (English)**: Cancelled-2022-P-010649-7444735
* **Tender Title (French)**: Annulé-2022-P-010649-7444735
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Publication Date**: December 15, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 15, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: January 25, 2023

## Contract Details

* **Contract Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Notice Type (English)**: Request for Proposal
* **Notice Type (French)**: Demande de propositions
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Regions of Opportunity**: World
* **Regions of Delivery**: Foreign

## Contract Status

* **Tender Status (English)**: Cancelled
* **Tender Status (French)**: Annulé

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Doray, Isabelle
* **Email**: Isabelle.Doray@international.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 343-551-0084
* **Contact Address**: 200, Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0G4, Canada

## Trade Agreements

* **List of Trade Agreements**: The tender is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Notice of Cancellation

The tender notice has been cancelled. Any previous communications or documentation submitted in response to this notice shall be disregarded. No further action is required. (Translated from French
